Html:
I just wanted to say thanks again. No issues, that you aren't already working on. I just wanted to make sure that everyone working on this knows just how much they are appreciated by people. I imagine it must be tough getting mostly, bug report, feature requests or modeling issues so.

Thanks for all the hard work this is an amazing application. If I could I'd buy you a beer or beverage of your choice.


"Think for yourselves and let others enjoy the privilege to do so, too"
----Voltaire.
